name: io.github.refined-element/lightning-enable-mcp
title: Lightning Enable MCP Server
description: AI agent Lightning payments: pay invoices, L402 auto-pay, wallet balance, payment history

environmentVariables.name: STRIKE_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: Strike API key for Lightning payments (recommended wallet)

environmentVariables.name: NWC_CONNECTION_STRING
environmentVariables.description: Nostr Wallet Connect URI (for NWC wallets like CoinOS, CLINK)

environmentVariables.name: LND_REST_HOST
environmentVariables.description: LND REST API host (e.g., localhost:8080)

environmentVariables.name: LND_MACAROON_HEX
environmentVariables.description: LND admin macaroon in hex format

environmentVariables.name: OPENNODE_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: OpenNode API key (direct payments only, no L402 support)

environmentVariables.name: OPENNODE_ENVIRONMENT
environmentVariables.description: OpenNode environment: production or dev (testnet)

environmentVariables.name: L402_MAX_SATS_PER_REQUEST
environmentVariables.description: Maximum satoshis allowed per single payment request

environmentVariables.name: L402_MAX_SATS_PER_SESSION
environmentVariables.description: Maximum total satoshis allowed per session
